product.name: Sand Eraser
product.description: This eraser is a reliable tool for clean and precise corrections. Made from high-quality materials, it gently removes pencil marks without smudging or damaging the paper. Perfect for school, office, or art use, its smooth texture ensures effortless erasing, making it an essential addition to any pencil case or workspace. Simple, effective, and built for everyday use!
